name: You can apply for a final order as a sole applicant JOINT SOLICITOR
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant 1: ((applicant1FullName))
Applicant 2: ((applicant2FullName))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

You can now apply for a final order as a sole applicant, on behalf of your client. This is because it has now been over 14 days since the other applicant was notified of your intention to apply for a final order. 

You need to sign into your account and select 'Switched to sole final order':  ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: You can now apply for a Final Order
